pr_title: Include locations/global in parent field to fix samples

timeline.message: Include locations/global in parent field to fix samples

timeline.bodyText: Really seems like the client library should be changed, like adding a toGlobalString() or asParent() methods.
timeline.author: lesv
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -98,7 +98,7 @@ public static void deIdentifyWithDateShift(
       // Combine configurations into a request for the service.
       DeidentifyContentRequest request =
           DeidentifyContentRequest.newBuilder()
-              .setParent(ProjectName.of(projectId).toString())
+              .setParent(String.format("%s/locations/global", ProjectName.of(projectId).toString()))

replies.bodyText:
Unfortunately the client library is generated, so we don't currently have a straightforward way to add arbitrary helper functions.
I agree that it's not ideal, but I'm unaware of better available options.
replies.author: sushicw

replies.bodyText: FYI, the Python library has a class method location_path. Worth checking if there's a similar thing in Java client.
replies.author: tmatsuo

replies.bodyText: Thanks Takashi, you're right! In Java it's LocationName and it's definitely the right way to go. Updating now.
replies.author: sushicw

replies.bodyText: @sushicw Please ping me once you've updated the PR.
replies.author: lesv
